description: Complete system overview detailing the multi-agent AI orchestration architecture, key components, and high-level data flow between major subsystems
Detailed documentation of the 17-agent orchestration system, including agent dependencies, workflow patterns, execution paths, and state management algorithms
Comprehensive documentation of the conversation state management system, including the three-state decision system, context pruning rules, and cache invalidation mechanisms

Technical details of the sandbox environment implementation, including idea generation algorithms, state isolation, and the progressive refinement workflow from mentioned → exploring → refined → ready_to_extract states
Documentation of the conversation intent classification system, workflow mapping algorithms, and conditional agent execution patterns based on conversation analysis
